title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 791.7 - Nonallowance of costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 791.7 - Nonallowance of costs

State Regulations

Costs relating to any proposal, project or application, or any amendment or change thereto, for which approval is required under this

Part and for which such approval was not obtained, shall not be considered
allowable costs for reimbursement pursuant to any of the Subparts contained
within Part 86 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
791.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
